summary: During World War II, the English mathematical genius Alan Turing tries to crack the German Enigma code with help from fellow mathematicians.
cast: Benedict Cumberbatch|Keira Knightley|Matthew Goode|Rory Kinnear|Allen Leech|Matthew Beard|Charles Dance|Mark Strong|James Northcote|Tom Goodman-Hill|Steven Waddington|Ilan Goodman|Jack Tarlton|Alex Lawther|Jack Bannon|Tuppence Middleton|Dominic Charman|James G. title: The Imitation Game (Descifrando Enigma)
